titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable House of Lords, in the Abbey-Church at Westminster, Wednesday the 28. of May 1645. Being the day appointed for solemne and publick humiliation. / By Alexander Henderson, minister at Edenburgh.
titleStmt.author: Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.N. for Robert Bostock, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Kings-head.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Kings-head.
